Generating Vlan & MAC-Pool

To generate Virtual LAN, perform the following:

 1. Enter the Vlan Starting ID.

 2. Enter the Number of Vlans that you require and click Add to generate the Virtual LAN.

Figure 5-2 VLAN

To generate the MAC Pool, perform the following:

 1. Select the Organization from the drop-down list. By default, root is displayed.

 2. Enter the starting address in the From Address text box.

 3. Select the Assignment Order from the drop-down.

 4. Enter the Number of MAC Addresses and click Add to generate MAC address.

Figure 5-3 MAC Pool

 5. Click Save and Next to proceed further.
